MWC.GUI.Tools

Interface Action

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BRTImporter.ImportBRTAction, CreateBuoyPattern.CreateBuoyPatternAction, CreateLabel.CreateLabelAction, CreateShape.CreateShapeAction, FitToWin.FitToWinAction, ImportData.ImportAction, ImportData2.ImportAction, MoveableDragger.MoveableDraggerAction, MoveDirection.MoveDirectionAction, OpenPlot.OpenPlotAction, OpenPlotXML.OpenPlotAction, Pan.PanAction, PlainCreate.CreateLabelAction, PlainCreate.CreateLayerAction, PlainCreateLayer.CreateLabelAction, PlainPropertyEditor.PropertyChangeAction, RightClickCutCopyAdaptor.CopyItem, RightClickCutCopyAdaptor.CutItem, RightClickCutCopyAdaptor.CutLayer, RightClickEdit.BooleanOperationAction, RightClickEdit.PlainOperationAction, RightClickEdit.SelectionOperationAction, RightClickPasteAdaptor.PasteItem, RightClickPasteAdaptor.PasteLayer, Save.SavePlotAction, SavePlotAs.SavePlotAction, SavePlotAsXML.SavePlotAction, ZoomIn.ZoomInAction, ZoomOut.ZoomOutAction, ZoomOut.ZoomOutAreaAction

    public interface Action
    parent class defining behavior of a tool, either on a toolbar or menu

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void execute()
      this method calls the 'do' event in the parent tool, passing the necessary data to it
      boolean isRedoable() 
      boolean isUndoable() 
      java.lang.String toString()
      method to produce string describing the activity waiting on the buffer
      void undo()
      this method calls the 'undo' event in the parent tool, passing the necessary data to it
